column7: Exposure fusion with TuFuse or enfuse. Automatic detection of image stacks.
Exposure fusion with enfuse or TuFuse. *) Pro version only.
Exposure fusion with enfuse, automatic detection of image stacks.
Supports 16-bit camera raw input via WIC plugins
(*) color mapping around the seams allows to preserve the original photometric properties of the images
